snippet: A crackdown against tax evasion could eventually extend to dividends, capital gains and royalties, significantly expanding the revenue earned by national treasuries.

byline.contributor: David Jolly contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: A crackdown against tax evasion could eventually extend to dividends, capital gains and royalties, significantly expanding the revenue earned by national treasuries.

headline.main: A Push Against Tax Havens Gains Support in Europe
headline.print_headline: A Push Against Tax Havens Gains Support in Europe
